channel.title: A few more questions
channel.description:
1)Somehow , KQ and KBD on my server have less than 50 HP (O.O) and I want to increase their maximum hp , where and how do I do that?? 2)I want to create a member shop , its not a problem to make a shop , but how do I make an item to be used by members only?? 3)How do I design a special character right (char right =5 or what ever) with a crown and all the other character right options for members?? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 23, 2009, 12:33:08 am[/size][hr]Why nobody is answering me??
Please help guys!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 23, 2009, 01:45:19 am[/size][hr]Come on guys help me out!

item.title: A few more questions

1)Somehow , KQ and KBD on my server have less than 50 HP (O.O) and I want to increase their maximum hp , where and how do I do that??
